1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 # import roslib; roslib.load_manifest('YOUR_PACKAGE_NAME_HERE')
3 import rospy
4 from std_msgs.msg import Float32
5 from rospy_tutorials.msg import Floats
6 from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist
7 
8 class Kinematics(object):
9  def __init__(self):
10  self.L = rospy.get_param("wheel_separation", 0.2)
11  self.R = rospy.get_param("wheel_radius", 0.035)
12  self.rate = rospy.get_param("rate", 10)
13  self.efforts = [0,0]
14  rospy.init_node("twist_to_motors", anonymous=False)
15  # send vl and vr to ros controller as setpoint command
16  self.pub_efforts = rospy.Publisher('/single_joint_actuator/joint1_velocity_controller', Float32, queue_size=1)
17  rospy.Subscriber('/cmd_vel', Twist, self.cmd_vel_cb)
18  #self.nodename = rospy.get_name()
19  #rospy.loginfo("%s started" % self.nodename)
20  # 10hz = 0.1s
21  self.rate = rospy.Rate(self.rate)
22  self.last_time = rospy.Time.now()
23  self.using_cmd_vel = False
24 
25  def cmd_vel_cb(self, msg):
26  #rospy.loginfo("Received a /cmd_vel message!")
27  #rospy.loginfo("Linear Components: [%f, %f, %f]"%(msg.linear.x,
28  #msg.linear.y, msg.linear.z))
29  #rospy.loginfo("Angular Components: [%f, %f, %f]"%(msg.angular.x,
30  #msg.angular.y, msg.angular.z))
31  self.using_cmd_vel = True
32  self.last_time = rospy.Time.now()
33 
34  # Do velocity processing here:
35  # Use the kinematics of your robot to map linear and angular velocities
36  # into motor commands
37  self.v = msg.linear.x
38  # the robot car doesn't move in y direction
39  # y = msg.linear.y
40  self.w = msg.angular.z
41  # vr
42  self.efforts[0] = (2.0 * self.v + self.w * self.L) / (2.0 * self.R)
43  # vl
44  self.efforts[1] = (2.0 * self.v - self.w * self.L) / (2.0 * self.R)
45 
46  def main(self):
47  #self.timeout_ticks = rospy.get_param("~timeout_ticks", 2)
48  #self.left = 0
49  #self.right = 0
50 
51  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
52  if self.using_cmd_vel and rospy.Time.now().to_sec() - self.last_time.to_sec() >= 1.0:
53  # stop motor if no cmd_vel in 1sec
54  self.efforts = [0,0]
55  self.using_cmd_vel = False
56  self.pub_efforts.publish(self.efforts[0])
57  self.rate.sleep()
58 
59 if __name__ == '__main__':
60  #try:
61  effort_cmd = Kinematics()
62  effort_cmd.main()
63  #except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
64  # pass
